resources.string: ZConnect is an upcoming platform which will revolutionize your way of interaction with the community. ZConnect is the online equivalent of any community in which people live together, be it your college, your company, or your locality. ZConnect gives you the power to interact virtually with the people in your community, using ZConnect’s simplified interface. Get alerts on the latest events, updated contacts, offers from shops and second-hand products on sale in your community.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation
No user to validate. Check again later.
Hey, check out this amazing app! ZConnect is a social network exclusively for our community.
Earn points by bringing your community folks on board! You and your friend both get 50 points each after your friend enters your community!
Send them your referral link now!
Only community and forum admins can see this.
